attributes.action: REVERSE THE RECENT CHANGES TO THE CGT RULES
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: IT IS A DISGRACE AND DISHONEST FOR THE GOVERNMENT TO SAY THIS IS A MEASURE TO MAKE THE WEALTHY PAY MORE TAX.THE ADDITIONAL TAX FOR WEALTHY PEOPLE WILL MEAN THEY ESCAPE WITHout ANY REAL HARDSHIP.THE GOVERNMENTWILL BENEFIT HUGELY TO FUND THEIR PAY,PENSIONS AND HOLIDAYS.THE MAN IN THE STREET WHO LIKE ME HAS HAD A BUSINESS FOR 30 YRS AND JUST ABOUT TO SELL HAS HAD THE RUG PULLED ON ALL MEASURES TO HELP SMALL PEOPLE AND A TAX INCREASE OF 80%.THE ONLY GOOD THING IS THAT MAYBE IF THEY DONT CHANGE IT VERY, VERY SOON THEY WILL BE OUT OF OFFICE,AS THEY SHOULD.
